input.sentences: the crew and i decided we wanted to have an easter party because why not | right ? its a nice chance to get together and have some fun .
we all made eggs and some of my friends got really creative which made it all the more fun .
we thought we should keep making eggs and they just kept getting more and more creative .
[male] brought some wood to show us and it turned out to be ancient wood that came from somewhere but i think her was just messing with us .
karly was so tired by the end though | with all the egg painting and carrying on . she actually fell asleep with her ears and robe still on .
output.sentences: The Easter party was nice fun.
My friends and I had fun painting eggs.
People got very creative with their eggs.
One guy started threatening to smash all the eggs with wood, but he was just messing around.
By the time the party was over every one was so tired from all the painting.
